alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Medina; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 3:01PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Medina, south central Cuyahoga and northern Summit Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 301 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Wadsworth, or 8 miles east of Medina, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Akron, Medina, Parma, Cuyahoga Falls, Brunswick, North Royalton, Hudson, Wadsworth, Twinsburg, Streetsboro, Macedonia, Stow, Broadview Heights, Brecksville, Seven Hills, Hinckley, Fairlawn, Independence, Northfield and Richfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
